channel.title: Npc help! plz!
channel.description:
[pre][b]hi peeps i got a own server too and its project 16 v.6 source and yeh its good server but how cna i let npc drop them items i typed for beginning suite of armor (453) i typed the npc only already in the ''autospawn'' i go to ''npcdrops.cfg'' but that npc stands nowhere in it stands not in ''npcdrops'' file so i typed this the npc and just for testing it //--------NPCID---------DropType-------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 453 1 995 15 that he just u can see now 15 coins and i restarted the srever and i killed it but nope :| no drop :(
can annyone help :D :D :D :D :D ;D ;D verry thanks!!! :rolleyes: Gr33tZ²²²*[/b][/pre][br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2007, 01:39:08 PM[/size][hr]is there annyone here would like to help me -.-

[pre][b]hi peeps
i got a own server too and its project 16 v.6 source
and yeh its good server
but how cna i let npc drop them items i typed for beginning suite of armor (453)
i typed the npc only already in the ‘‘autospawn’’
i go to ‘‘npcdrops.cfg’’
but that npc stands nowhere in
it stands not in ‘‘npcdrops’’ file
so i typed this the npc and just for testing it
//--------NPCID---------DropType-------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 453 1 995 15
that he just u can see now 15 coins
and i restarted the srever and i killed it but nope
no drop

can annyone help ;D ;D
verry thanks!!! :rolleyes:
